rk.current.respawn.time.value: {green}{0}{default} respawn time currently is {green}{1}{default} seconds. To change it use {green}setmaprespawntime <seconds>{default}!
rk.changed.respawn.time: Respawn Time for the map {green}{0}{default} has been changed to {green}{1}{default} seconds!
rk.changed.auto.detection: Respawn-Kill Auto-Detection in {green}{0}{default} has been changed to {green}{1}{default}!
rk.current.auto.detection.value: {green}{0}{default} Respawn-Kill Auto-Detection currently is {green}{1}{default}. To change it use {green}autodetectrespawnkill <0/1>{default}!
rk.incorrect.arg: {red}Wrong argument type!{default} Type the command name to see the correct use.
rk.auto.detection.disable.respawn: Auto-Detection has detected Respawn-Kill, disabling respawn!
rk.timer.disable.respawn: Map respawn has been disabled ({green}{0}{default} seconds)!
rk.restart.new.config: New map configs writted, restarting round.
